document.full_text: the killing of osama bin laden has given president obama a sharp bump in his job performance approval rating among both republican and democratic voters, according to the latest new york times/cbs news poll.
document.title: at war: bin laden's killing helps president's poll numbers
lines_and_colors: the killing of osama bin laden has given president obama a sharp bump in his job performance approval rating among both republican and democratic voters, according to the latest new york times/cbs news poll.
